holidays.description: Cookies are more than just a baked treat, with generations bonding over it.

holidays.title: Flake Appreciation Day
holidays.description: This Flake Appreciation Day, let's appreciate the lovely, distinctive, and naturally occurring snowflakes.

holidays.title: Guru Ghasidas Jayanti
holidays.description: Guru Ghasidas Jayanti in Chhattisgarh is observed on December 18 to mark his birthday.

holidays.title: International Migrants Day
holidays.description: The reality of migration is more than just starting over.

holidays.title: National Crime Junkie Day
holidays.description: Celebrate your love for true crime along with your fellow crime junkies on December 18.

holidays.title: National Roast Suckling Pig Day
holidays.description: You don’t have to wait until Christmas to pig out on a decadent feast.

holidays.title: Qatar National Day
holidays.description: Sit back and enjoy the magnificence of Qatar National Day as well as its cultural significance.

holidays.title: Republic Day of Niger
holidays.description: Join in and celebrate with us as we honor this special West African nation.

holidays.title: Wear a Plunger on Your Head Day
holidays.description: Add a bit of silliness to your life on Wear a Plunger on Your Head Day.

holidays.title: Ashley Benson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This movie star who’s creating a big name for herself in Hollywood is built for success.

holidays.title: Ayaka Iida’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate one of Japan’s biggest pop icons who has reached the height of her career.

holidays.title: Brad Pitt’s Birthday
holidays.description: A great actor like Brad Pitt has done extraordinary things, breathing life into the acting scene.

holidays.title: Bridgit Mendler’s Birthday
holidays.description: She has heavily influenced Gen Z’s memories. Let’s look at what she’s done!

holidays.title: Chris FamilyFunPack’s Birthday
holidays.description: Grab the birthday hats and don your best party clothes. It is time to party!

holidays.title: Christina Aguilera’s Birthday
holidays.description: Christina Aguilera, nicknamed the "Voice of a Generation," was always destined for stardom.

holidays.title: DMX’s Birthday
holidays.description: Bring out the balloons and cake, and let us celebrate the birthday of this legend together!

holidays.title: Franz Ferdinand’s Birthday
holidays.description: The legacy of the heir to the imperial throne of the Austro-Hungarian empire lives on.

holidays.title: Joseph Stalin’s Birthday
holidays.description: Joseph Stalin brought a reign of terror, and those who opposed him paid with their lives.

holidays.title: Katie Holmes’s Birthday
holidays.description: A renowned actress whose aura and talent linger, Katie Holmes blesses us with her performances.

holidays.title: Keith Richards’s Birthday
holidays.description: Achieving the great success musicians dream of, he is a cultural icon in his own right.

holidays.title: Lyrica Anderson’s Birthday
holidays.description: With a bubbly personality and ample talent, she has been killing it for a decade.

holidays.title: Maria Brink’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s come together and celebrate an American music goddess on her birthday.

holidays.title: Paul Klee’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a pioneer of expressionism and surrealism and a highly celebrated artist of the 20th century.

holidays.title: Rachel in Wonderland’s Birthday
holidays.description: Put on that sparkly dress and cosplay as your favorite character as we celebrate Rachel’s birthday!

holidays.title: Ray Liotta’s Birthday
holidays.description: Celebrate Ray Liotta: A true cinematic legend who has graced our screens for decades.

holidays.title: Ronald Acuna Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: This legendary sportsman has set himself apart in the world of baseball.

holidays.title: Steven Spielberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: His works offer a glimpse of his talent, which has wowed audiences around the globe.

holidays.title: Stone Cold Steve Austin’s Birthday
holidays.description: In and out of the ring, no one could match Stone Cold, the Texan Rattlesnake.

holidays.title: YBN Nahmir’s Birthday
holidays.description: YBN Nahmir spoke his wins into existence and is now living a once farsighted dream.

holidays.title: ZaZa Bean’s Birthday
